actions.text: On agreeing to the Huizenga (MI) amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Huizenga (MI).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Huizenga (MI) amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

description: Amendment clarifies the disqualification from the exemption of any broker or associated person who is subject to suspension or revocation of registration, and the in-applicability of the exemption to any M&A transaction where one party or more is a shell company.
purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part A of House Report 114-414 to clarify the disqualification from the exemption of any broker or associated person who is subject to suspension or revocation of registration, and the in-applicability of the exemption to any M&A transaction where one party or more is a shell company.
